text: I don't know what the secret to longevity as an actress is. It's more than talent and beauty. Maybe it's the audience seeing itself in you.
author: Joan Blondell

text: The beauty of women was the first expression of my photography.
author: Alberto Korda

text: What I want to give in the theatre is beauty, that's what I want to give.
author: Dame Edith Evans

text: I want the Arabic Granada, that which is art, which is all that seems to me beauty and emotion.
author: Isaac Albeniz

text: The flowers anew, returning seasons bring but beauty faded has no second spring.
author: Ambrose Philips
